login.subject: Login confirmation for the CityOS
login.message:
You have requested access to the CHT CityOS.

Please click the link to confirm login.
login.extra: If you didn’t request a code, you can simply ignore this email.

resetPassword.subject: Forgot your password?
resetPassword.message:
That’s ok, it happens!

Click on the button below to reset your password. If you did not request a password reset or received this email by mistake, you can safely ignore it. Your password won’t be changed.
